hypothesis_content.title: Multi-Liquidity Shock Convergence → Volatility Regime Prediction
hypothesis_content.statement: When Fed liquidity injection, BOJ policy shift, and crypto structural liquidity events occur within 10 trading days, BTC will enter low-volatility regime (<40% IV) for 5-7 days before explosive move (>10%) in predictable direction based on net liquidity delta.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Multiple liquidity shocks from different sources create confusion phase where volatility compresses as participants await clarity, then resolves directionally toward net liquidity effect.
entry_conditions: Three liquidity events (Fed, BOJ, crypto-specific) within 10 days
Net liquidity delta calculation (proprietary model) > $15B equivalent
Term structure of volatility in contango

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC makes >10% directional move within 7 days of volatility compression
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Volatility expands without directional resolution (choppy markets)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volatility remains elevated (>60%) throughout observation period
